executable.title: ROImean
executable.description: Compute the EACSF sum and mean by region

file.name: InputMeasurement
file.description: A txt file with the values of EA-CSF desnity at each vertex

file.name: AtlasSurfaceLabeling
file.description: a labeling txt ( for example: atlas destrieux) which divides the brain to many regions

file.name: OutputFileName1
file.description: A txt file with the values of regional mean of EACSF

file.name: OutputFileName2
file.description: A txt file with the values of regional sum of EACSF
